codex.name: Wired Chaos Codex
codex.purpose: Serve as the living knowledge base and IP governance layer for all Film3 productions.

functions.lore_repository: Stores and organizes canonical data (scripts, visuals, lore, timelines) for all Wired Chaos IPs including Echoes of the Block.
functions.ai_reference_core: Connects to GPT-5 model endpoints for narrative logic and continuity validation.
functions.metadata_registry: Creates immutable metadata entries for each uploaded creative asset using Arweave/IPFS hashes.
functions.style_guide_engine: Applies brand tone, palette, and narrative style rules during AI generation.
functions.legal_framework: Maintains licensing parameters, CALA agreements, and creator credentials.

access_roles.Public_User: Read-only canonical access via Film3 Wiki

emergent.name: Wired Chaos Emergent
emergent.purpose: Dynamic AI-driven creative evolution and cross-creator collaboration environment.

functions.ai_collaboration_engine: Facilitates joint creation sessions between verified creators with shared prompts and AI mediation.
functions.adaptive_story_generation: Analyzes audience response data and proposes new story branches or visual directions.
functions.asset_fusion_system: Combines multiple creator assets (sound, video, text) into composite works via generative synthesis.
functions.trend_mapping: Monitors creative and cultural trends to recommend projects for Wired Chaos co-production.
functions.revenue_analytics: Tracks engagement metrics and auto-distributes royalties per contract split.

data_sources.Codex_Lore: read-only API link for world-building consistency

interaction_modes.Co_Creation: Two or more creators collaborate in real-time through shared AI workspace.
